VersionInfo.Title: West Wind Markdown Monster 0.48 now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This update adds word and line counts and notifications when documents have been changed externally by other applications. Recent updates have added support non-SnagIt screen captures. You can now also import existing blog posts and have them converted in Markdown. The editor now refreshes the preview whenever you stop typing for more than 1 second. Refreshes only update the render content for much quicker and less intrusive and less jittery Preview updates. Markdown Monster can now also be launched from the command line via system path as *MarkdownMonster*.
For more detailed release info please see: https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/master/Changelog.md
